descriptionHtml:
1/28/2013 Lord Banewrath Sunblade

 This mod adds brand new custom weapons to the game. Two new templar swords in one hand and two hand versions.
Two new templar hammers in one and two handed versions. The hammer was in the release of my previous mod but I 
did a few texture updates and made a special two handed version because it was requested.I decided to integrate 
the hammer mod into the swords mod and build upon it from there. I plan on adding more new custom models as my 
experience with making new meshes and texturing improves. These are brand new models that use existing skyrim texture assets.

 The weapons have two different types. Each weapon has a regular steel counterpart that can be crafted and
tempered in the normal steel smithing tab. The higher quality weapons are equal to daedric in power and can
be upgraded at the skyforge while being classed as silver weapons that will do enhanced damage to undead foes. These
higher quality weapons are only found as loot and I placed only a few in the gameworld. I also decided to experiment 
and give the bsa builder tool in the ck a try. Now there are no more meshes and texture folders, just the esp and the bsa
to drop into your data folder and that should ease installation more.

 The higher quality versions can be found in these locations.

The Shrine of Talos interior cell
Volunruud
Movarths Lair
Frostflow Lighthouse Abyss
Fort Neugrad


 You may not alter or use the assets from this mod without permission. You MAY translate it to your language
and upload it to your national modding site, because I know you are just going to do it anyway. User beware though,
I only make my mods in english and if you download a different language version from a different site and your pc 
explodes or you get a virus, Don`t say I didn`t warn you. I only host my mods on the Nexus.

 So until the next update, enjoy the weapons and have a good day. 

 

      Version 2 update 1/29/2013

   A new battlehammer was added. A new one handed hammer, and two handed hammer. All weapons are added to the steel crafting 
lists along with three new unique daedric quality weapons found in the folloing cells.

Ravenscar Hollow
Tovolds Cave
septimus outpost


     Version 3 update 2/1/2013

    Version 3 adds two new templar themed shields. One kite and one tower type. Two new maces have been created and added. One 
spiked mace and one flanged mace. Two new swords added. One bastard sword and one claymore. Two new hammers added. One single 
hand and one two handed. The new items have been added to the following cells.

Trevas Watch
Valthume
Rimerock Burrow
Lunds Hut
Drelas Cottage
Forsaken cave
author: Lord Banewrath Sunblade
